text: Terracini is a surname. It is the surname of: * (1889–1968), Italian mathematician *Catherine Terracini (born c. 1982), Italian-born Australian actress, daughter of Lyndon *Lyndon Terracini (born 1950), Australian opera singer and director *Paul Terracini (born 1957), Australian composer and conductor *Susanna Terracini (born 1963), English-born Italian mathematician *Umberto Terracini (1895–1983), president of the Constituent Assembly of Italy
title: Terracini
